 1998-05761998-04-020,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  TB,  AGRI-FOOD
PrecisAuthority to enter into a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT to amend the CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA ENHANCED MATCHING CONTRIBUTION FOR NISA (Net Income Stabilization Account) in order to allow for a more equitable determination of a producer's NISA-eligible net sales, and for producers to make additional, matchable, enhanced deposits to their NISA accounts.
